title: Japan Five-Star Beachside Resort on Ishigaki Island
description: Embrace Okinawa opulence with an escape to the five-star ANA InterContinental Ishigaki Resort, an IHG Hotel, the perfect beachside gateway to the natural splendour of the Yaeyama archipelago. Dine across seven superb bars and restaurants - including fine-dining omakase at Sushi Ishigaki, fresh Okinawa seafood at SALTIDA and global gourmet fare at Fireside Terrace - or grab your snorkelling gear and seek out the fabled blue coral of nearby Shiraho Reef.
location_description: ANA InterContinental Ishigaki Resort, an IHG Hotel
